Logic Studio is a complete collection of professional tools that gives musicians everything they need to create, produce and perform in the studio and on stage. Logic Studio includes Logic Pro 9, a major upgrade that combines an intuitive new interface with the renowned sound quality and exceptional capabilities of Logic, and the premiere of MainStage, an innovative new live performance application that turns a Mac into a fantastic team sound for concerts. Logic Studio also includes Soundtrack Pro 2, professional post-production software, audio, Studio Instruments, featuring 40 professional high quality instruments, Studio Effects, with plug-ins for professional purposes, the extensive library of Studio Sound Library, and a powerful set of production utilities. In the center of Logic Studio is Logic Pro 9, now with an intuitive single-window interface for instant access to powerful music creation and production, including sample accurate editing directly in the Arrange window. New audio production tools such as Quick Swipe Comping and dynamic channel strip creation speed up common tasks. Logic Pro 8 also includes sound production capacity (UMA) with innovative surround panning controls, multichannel tracks and busses, and support for software instruments and effects True Surround.

Installing Logic Studio 9:

   1. Ride the Virtual Image "logicstudio.cdr"
   2. Right click on Alias and Shortcut "Install Logic Studio"
   3. Copy "LogicStudio.mpkg" which just opened to your desktop
   4. Open the file "LogicStudio_noSN Installer Patch" you downloaded with the cracks
   5. Drag the file "LogicStudio.mpkg" you copied to the Desktop to the frame of the window that opened "LogicStudio_noSN Installer Patch." The message "LogicStudio.mpkg has been successfully patched", confirming that the installer has been patched correctly
   6. Installation of the file "LogicStudio.mpkg" on your desktop (not for installation)
   7. Start the installation "Install Logic Studio" or file "LogicStudio.mpkg", but this time mounted virtual image, I mean the "logicstudio.cdr"
   8. You can close the facility open on the desktop and continue with the Virtual Image
   9. I'll not ask for any serial and you can install without problems Logis Studio

Includes NoSeriales for:

    * Compressor 3.5
    * Logic Pro 9
    * Installer logicstudio
    * Soundtrack Pro 3
    * WaveBurner 1.6

Note: For applications still missing there is no crack.

For the first time you start Logic Pro 9, Compressor 3.5, Soundtrack Pro WaveBurner 3 or 1.6 you should patch the corresponding application launcher, as well as HiScan in step 4 and 5, but this time with the patch application-specific all included in the package.
